resources.string: Recommendations are linked to your account and are public.
Mods make your phone easier, faster, and smarter. In this guide, you can discover new mods, learn what they do, and enable or disable them.
Mods help you complete tasks more efficiently. That means fewer taps, less jumping between apps, and more time saved to do the things you want.
Make your phone a lean, mean mod machine
Mods turn your favorite features into streamlined experiences. That means less data used and less to store\u2014so you have room left for the photos, music, and apps you care about.
It\'s like a dance party for your apps
Mods let your apps play together, creating effortless new experiences that surprise you and make you smile. In the world of mods, things just work.

Quickly request and track rides with the Uber mod. Start a ride by tapping a highlighted address in compatible apps like Browser, Email, and Messaging. You can even track your driver\'s status right on your lock screen. The Uber mod gives you fast access to the Uber app, so download it sign in to get started.
Download the Uber app from the Play Store, then sign into the service. During rides made by the Uber app, your lock screen will display a map and driver information.

Download the Uber app from the Play Store, then sign into the service. Addresses sent and recevied in Messaging will automatically include a map and a ride button. Tapping the button will open the Uber app with the address entered as the destination.

Download the Uber app from the Play Store, then sign into the service. Address links in browser and elsewhere will include a quick estimate when choosing what app to open the address in. Tapping this estimate will open the Uber app with the address entered as the destination.
Meet Cortana, your new personal assistant

The Cortana mod is deeply integrated into Cyanogen OS, allowing you to do everything from setting reminders to scheduling meetings—but more importantly… is your hair on point? You can tell Cortana to “take a selfie”, giving you voice controlled, hands free, automatic countdown for capturing your picture. You can even use your voice to search right from the lock screen. Currently, the Cortana mod is only available in the United States.

To enable the Cortana mod for lock screen simply navigate to the phone’s settings menu, scroll down and select Lock Screen, then select Lock Screen Mods, then tap Cortana to set her as your lock screen mod of choice. Once enabled, simply unlock your phone and swipe left to access the Cortana mod for lock screen.

Access Cortana via the lock screen mod or app, then say “Hey Cortana” or press the mic button. Once she is listening simply ask her to “take a selfie” and she will open the camera and snap a photo automatically.
Prevent unwanted spam calls and texts.
A global database of over two billion numbers allows the Truecaller mod to identify incoming spam calls and texts in the phone and messaging apps so you can block them for good.

Open the Phone and navigate to the settings menu. Toggle on Truecaller, and follow the prompts to enable the mod. The Truecaller mod is now enabled and will be used anytime you receive an incoming phone call.

Open the Phone and navigate to the phone’s settings menu. Toggle on Truecaller, and follow the prompts to enable the mod. The Truecaller mod is now enabled and will be used anytime you receive an incoming text message.
Take a note anytime, from anywhere in the OS

Take notes simply and intuitively anytime—from anywhere in the OS. The OneNote mod creates different places throughout the OS that OneNote functionality can be used, from the dialer to the browser and beyond. There\'s even a dedicated Quick Settings Tile so you can jot down a quick note anytime.

Download and install the OneNote app from the Play Store. From the top of the home screen, pull down the quick settings dropdown menu. Select Take note. You will be prompted with a message asking you what you’d like to use to complete this action. The window will read Take note with OneNote. Select Always. Type your note, including a title, into the floating window. Tap on the checkbox to save the note to OneNote.

Download and install the OneNote app from the Play Store. Upon receiving an incoming phone call, answer it. On the ongoing call screen, tap the + button. You will be prompted with a message asking you what you’d like to use to complete this action. The window will read Take note with OneNote. Select Always. Type your note into the floating window associated with the ongoing phone call. Tap on the checkbox to save the note to OneNote.

Download and install the OneNote app from the Play Store. Open Email and swipe right on an email. Select the Actions button to display email options, and tap on Take note with OneNote. You will be prompted with a message asking you what you’d like to use to complete this action. The window will read Take note with OneNote. Select Always. Type your note into the floating window associated with the selected email. Tap on the checkbox to save the note to OneNote.
Life moves at its own pace, your videos don’t have to

Microsoft Hyperlapse creates smooth and stabilized time lapses from first-person videos. Simply open the Camera app, pull up the mode switcher and select Hyperlapse. Now you can shoot, edit, and share Hyperlapse videos without ever needing to download a special app.
Open Camera and select mode. Tap on Hyperlapse.

Open Gallery and tap on an existing video. Tap the menu button and select Create Hyperlapse. Trim the video as desired by moving the two markers. Tap the checkbox to create the Hyperlapse. Review the Hyperlapse, and tap the checkbox to save it.
The Skype features you love, right in the Phone app

The Skype mod is integrated directly into the phone dialer, so searching for Skype contacts and viewing your Skype call history has never been easier. You can even upgrade to a Skype video call directly from an ongoing phone call.

To access the Skype mod for phone simply navigate to the phone, select the phone keypad and then tap the drop-down menu on the left hand side above the keypad. Select Skype Once selected, simply search for the contact you want to call.
View trending tweets right on your lock screen
Simply wake your phone up to view trending and relevant tweets from Twitter right on the lock screen.

To enable the Twitter mod for lock screen simply navigate to the phone’s settings menu, scroll down and select Lock Screen, then select Lock Screen Mods, then tap Happening on Twitter to set it as your lock screen mod of choice. Once enabled, simply unlock your phone and swipe left to view trending tweets.
Discover new mods and enable them
Mods make your phone easier, faster, and smarter. Discover new mods, learn about their features, and enable them.
